胐字的基本解释

胐
fěi
新月开始有亮光：“三月，惟丙午胐。”
天刚发亮：“（日）登于扶桑，爰始将行，是谓胐明。”
农历初三的代称：“三日曰胐。”

胐
kū
屁股。
胯骨。
脚弯曲。

胐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fěi］
［《廣韻》敷尾切，上尾，敷。］
［《廣韻》滂佩切，去隊，滂。］
亦作“胐1”。
(1)新月初现貌。
(2)泛指星月出现或升起。
(3)旧历每月初三日的月相名，因用以纪日，为初三日的代称。
(4)谓天刚发亮。参见“朏明”、“朏朏”。
(5)聚积貌。参见“朏朏”。
[②]［kū］
［《廣韻》苦骨切，入没，溪。］
亦作“胐2”。
臀。
[③]［zhuó］
同“茁1”。

胐字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　胐； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页978第06
【廣韻】苦骨切，音窟。胐臀。【正字通】按俗謂髀之近竅者爲髀窟。【博雅】胐，腳也。【釋文】篤骨反。　又【集韻】張滑切，音窡。厀疾。

胐字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
胐字的起名意思

暂无。

胐
Basic explanation of words
胐
fěi
The new moon began to shine: "In March, only Bingwuxuan."
The day lighted up: "(Sun) boarded in Fusang, the beginning of the line is about to go, it is called Ming Ming."
On the third day of the lunar calendar, the generational name: "The third day is called 胐."
胐
kū
butt.
hip bone.
The foot is bent.
胐
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fěi］
["Guangyun" apply tail cut, upper tail, apply. ]
["Guangyun" Peng Peiqie, go to the team, Peng. ]
Also known as "胐1".
(1) The appearance at the beginning of the new moon.
(2) Generally refers to the appearance or rise of stars and moons.
(3) The name of the moon phase on the third day of each month in the lunar calendar is used to record the day, so it is the name of the third day.
(4) It is said that the sky is just shining. See "朏朏", "朏朏".
(5) Accumulation appearance. See "朏朏".
[②]［kū］
["Guangyun" is bitter, enters the river. ]
Also known as "胐2".
Hip.
[③] [zhuó]
Same as "Jiao 1".
胐
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Department of meat characters] 　胐; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 978 06
[Guang Yun] Bitter bone cut, sound cave. Hip. 【Zhengzitong】According to the common sense, the person who is close to the orifice of the 髀 is called the 髀ku. [Bo Ya] 胐, feet also. [Explanation] Rebellious.　[Jiyun] Zhang Huaqie, sound mule. Sickness.
